Nerdy stuff is like textbooks, calculators, pens and pencils, measuring devices, etc.

Geeky stuff is like posters, figurines, replicas, etc.

Hence, I'm more nerd than geek.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d2f77c63687263ab4d0100#post_54d2f77c63687263ab4d0100
Comedy is all about timing and finesse.
It's less in what you say and nore how you say it.
And it can't be forced. You have to let it flow.
